text: Just got Lopecode's plain text serialisation format deterministic so its now git diff friendly! The first version of the new multi-notebook architecture is public <https://tomlarkworthy.github.io/lopecode/@tomlarkworthy_lopepage.html#modules=%40tomlarkworthy%2Fmodule-selection&view=R100%28C50%28S50%28%40tomlarkworthy%2Fmodule-selection%29%2CS50%28%40tomlarkworthy%2Feditor%29%29%2CS50%28%40tomlarkworthy%2Ffileattachments%29%29|here> from the <https://github.com/tomlarkworthy/lopecode/tree/main|lopecode repository>. The code editing experience sucks and I lost a lot of functionality switching to dockered multi-notebook but it is so much better being able to work on two or more reactively linked notebooks at the same time it will be worth the backward step long term.

elements.text: Just got Lopecode's plain text serialisation format deterministic so its now git diff friendly! The first version of the new multi-notebook architecture is public

. The code editing experience sucks and I lost a lot of functionality switching to dockered multi-notebook but it is so much better being able to work on two or more reactively linked notebooks at the same time it will be worth the backward step long term.
